Scheduler¶

Scheduler module

daffy.vm.scheduler.DVM_scheduler_operation_add(type, name, args, scheduler)[source]¶

Create an operation, resolve its dependencies and add it to the scheduler’s opstable (and to the runnables queue if all of its dependencies are ready)

daffy.vm.scheduler.DVM_scheduler_operation_find(name, scheduler)[source]¶

Find and operation by name in the scheduler’s opstable

daffy.vm.scheduler.DVM_scheduler_refresh(scheduler)¶

Find which operations in the scheduler’s opstable can be run and puts them in the runnables queue

exception daffy.vm.scheduler.DependencyError[source]¶

Missing dependency

exception daffy.vm.scheduler.OperationAlreadyExistsError[source]¶

The operation name already exists in the scheduler table

exception daffy.vm.scheduler.OperationNotFoundError[source]¶

The operation was not found in the scheduler table

class daffy.vm.scheduler.Scheduler(loglevel=0)[source]¶

A Scheduler object keeps a table of all operations and a queue of operations that can be run, as all their dependancies are ready

class daffy.vm.scheduler.Updater(scheduler)¶

A coordination thread that updates dependencies once an operation has finished

class daffy.vm.scheduler.Worker(scheduler)¶

A worker thread that execute operations from the runnables queue of a give scheduler

exception daffy.vm.scheduler.WrongArgumentError[source]¶

Wrong argument in operation creation

daffy.vm.scheduler.op_is_runnable(op, scheduler)¶

Check if an operation is runnable

daffy.vm.scheduler.op_requirements_set(op, scheduler)¶

Loop over an operation inputs and set its requirements

daffy.vm.scheduler.op_set_as_finished(op, scheduler)¶

Notify operations depending on op that its ouputs are ready
